title: Nono-chan
synopsis: Nono-chan is the eldest daughter in the Yamada family and a third-grade elementary school student. Her family consists of her father, Mr Yamada Takashi, her mother, Mrs Yamada Matsuko and her brother, Noboru, a junior high student. Together with her grandmother, the family of five makes up a pleasant Japanese family. Everyone is special and everyday is always filled with joy and surprise.
voices: ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', 'Takato, Yasuhiro', 'Suzuki, Reiko', 'Yamamoto, Keiko', 'Ootani, Ikue', 'Takagi, Wataru', 'Yamazaki, Wakana', 'Suzuki, Takuma', 'Noda, Junko', 'Komatsu, Yuka']
staff: [['Sakurada, Hiroyuki', ['Producer']], ['Nishizawa, Nobutaka', ['Director']], ['Ootani, Ikue', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Baillien, Carole', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
